ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is used for selecting prefix and suffix picklist field.User cant select both prefix and suffix at a time as well as user cant select blank picklist value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(NSSales_609_1_Suffix__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(NSSales_609_1_Prefix__c, ""), $RecordType.DeveloperName = "NSSales_609_1", Id != null), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(NSSales_609_1_Prefix__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(NSSales_609_1_Suffix__c))), $RecordType.DeveloperName = "NSSales_609_1", Id != null) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select either Prefix or Suffix in order to save the Opportunity. You cannot select both at the same time.
